label: 像法
対訳語: The age of  Imitation [Image] of the law
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Saddharma-pratirūpaka. The age comprising the period between 500 and 1500 years after the demise of the historical Buddha when doctrine and practice prevailed, but no attainment (p. 337).
